mapper.select: SELECT g.*, p.bookingOpenDaysBefore FROM games g JOIN sportBookingPolicies p ON g.sportId = p.sportId WHERE g.gameDate = #{date} AND g.status = '판매예정' AND g.gameTime BETWEEN '14:00:00' AND '19:30:00'

SELECT g.*, p.bookingCloseMinutesAfterStart FROM games g JOIN sportBookingPolicies p ON g.sportId = p.sportId WHERE g.gameDate = #{date} AND g.status = '판매중' AND g.gameTime BETWEEN '14:00:00' AND '19:30:00'
